name: Lemlist
natural_language_description: 这是 Lemlist 节点。主要用于: Consume the Lemlist API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: activity

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: campaignId (值: None) - ID of the campaign to retrieve activity for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
type (值: None) - Type of activity to retrieve

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.description: ID of the campaign to unsubscribe the lead from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
campaignId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign Name or ID | 作用: ID of the campaign to unsubscribe the lead from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: Email to delete from the unsubscribes
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email to delete from the unsubscribes

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: companyName (值: None) - Company name of the lead to create
deduplicate (值: None) - Whether to do not insert if this email is already present in another campaign
firstName (值: None) - First name of the lead to create
lastName (值: None) - Last name of the lead to create
icebreaker (值: None) - Icebreaker of the lead to create
phone (值: None) - Phone number of the lead to create
picture (值: None) - Picture URL of the lead to create
linkedinUrl (值: None) - LinkedIn URL of the lead to create
